CustomField.formula: IF(MID(product_answer_escape_w_flights__c, 9, 1) = "3", "3-Perfect length", IF(MID(product_answer_escape_w_flights__c, 9, 1) = "2", "2-More nights please", IF(MID(product_answer_escape_w_flights__c, 9, 1) = "1", "1-Less nights please", "0-No Answer")))
CustomField.label: Accom Duration
